name: Viridescent Venerer
title: Dream of Broken Leaves: Viridescent Venerer
desc: "One day, in those boundless hunting grounds... we will meet again."
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo Die. (Once per Round)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo Die. (Once per Round)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo.(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
